actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: A bill to provide for the transportation of dependents of members of the uniformed services who are stationed in Alaska and Hawaii and who are in need of medical attention not available in the area where the member is stationed.

summary.text: Authorizes the payment of transportation expenses related to necessary medical care for dependents of a member of the uniformed services who is stationed in Alaska or Hawaii.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the transportation of dependents of members of the uniformed services who are stationed in Alaska and Hawaii and who are in need of medical attention not available in the area where the member is stationed.
